raw_comment: I notice that young women are far more likely to keep in contact with their families on a regular basis. I also notice that not many young people visit in person and most only text a couple of times a week. I wonder why men do not talk to their parents as much as women. This can relate to my community because I have a 20-year-old sister in college and an 18-year-old brother about to go to college. I wonder if my brother will not call my family as much as my sister does. A catchy headline would be: "Thanks for raising me... bye"
ace_sentences: I notice that young women are more likely than young men to keep in contact with their families on a regular basis.
I notice that few young people visit their families in person.
I notice that most young people only text their families a couple of times a week.
I wonder why men do not talk to their parents as much as women do.
My brother is about to go to college.
I wonder if my brother will not call my family as much as my sister calls my family.
The headline is: Thanks for raising me... bye.
